channel.title: Item Catalog on The GUTS+ System
channel.description: Recent content in Item Catalog on The GUTS+ System

item.title: Clothing
item.description: Clothing is a subset of items that can be worn on a character’s torso, legs, or feet. When they are not being worn, they are treated as regular items stored in the character’s inventory.

item.title: Jeans
item.description: A basic legs clothing item. Can be styled however a player would like.

item.title: Sneakers
item.description: A basic feet clothing item. Can be styled however a player would like. Allows character to comfortably walk on hard or uneven ground.

item.title: T-Shirt
item.description: A basic torso clothing item. Can be styled however a player would like.
